I would use a physical library or bookstore to access information. I would search for books or journals related to the topic I need information on and read them in person.
I would use a physical map or atlas to access information. I would search for the location of the information I need and travel there to gather it.
I would use a physical encyclopedia or reference book to access information. I would search for the topic I need information on and read the relevant entries.
I would use a physical note-taking app or journal to access information. I would search for the topic I need information on and write down any relevant notes or information I can find.
I would use a physical telegraph or messenger service to access information. I would send a message to someone who has the information I need and wait for a response.
